message: Let's split it 50/50, Bob. What do you say?
You're being too generous, I'll take this deal
You took a big share last round, now it's my turn to take a bigger cut. Accept or lose!
You're getting aggressive, but I'm not backing down
I'm taking a risk, but I need a bigger share to make up for inflation. Accept or I'll walk away!
I'll meet you halfway, but don't expect me to give in completely
